short_summary: Permanent residence status for entrepreneurs who have high potential to build a start-up in Canada or other places.
description: IRCC will establish a Start-Up Visa program \/ service to provide permanent residence status to entrepreneurs who have the potential to build high-growth start-ups.
full_summary:
=====================

* **Tender Title:** Start-Up Visa (SUV) Program for High-Potential Entrepreneurs
* **Publication Date:** 2023-02-28
* **Tender Closing Date:** 2023-04-03 14:00:00
* **Contract Term:** March 31, 2024

**Introduction:**
The Immigration, Refugees, and Citizenship Canada (IRCC) seeks to engage contractors to provide guidance and recommendations on the Start-Up Visa (SUV) program. The SUV program aims to provide permanent residence status to entrepreneurs who have the potential to build high-growth start-ups in Canada (excluding the province of Quebec).

**Scope of Work:**
The contractors will provide expertise on business incubators, angel investor groups, and venture capital funds, advising IRCC on the designation and revocation of designated entities, as well as conducting peer reviews of commitments issued by designated entities. The objective of this requirement is to support the integrity of the SUV program.

**Procurement Details:**

* The procurement method is competitive, with open bidding.
* The selection criteria is based on the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
* The trade agreements applicable to this procurement include:
	+ Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)
	+ Comprehensive and Progressive Agreement for Trans-Pacific Partnership (CPTPP)
	+ Canada-Honduras Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Panama Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Chile Free Trade Agreement (CCFTA)
	+ Canada-Colombia Free Trade Agreement
	+ Canada-Ukraine Free Trade Agreement (CUFTA)
	+ Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement (CKFTA)
	+ North American Free Trade Agreement (NAFTA)
	+ World Trade Organization Agreement on Government Procurement (WTO GPA)
	+ Canada-Peru Free Trade Agreement (CPFTA)
	+ Canada-European Union Comprehensive Economic and Trade Agreement (CETA)
* The regions of opportunity, delivery, and currency are Canada.

**Contact Information:**
For more information, please contact:
Jeremy Finn, Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada
Email: [Jeremy.Finn@cic.gc.ca](mailto:Jeremy.Finn@cic.gc.ca)
Phone: (343) 576-0543

**Attachments:**
The tender documents and annexes are available at:

* English: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/4023/cic-155938---rfp---english
